metadata.title: CVE-2019-17632 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty versions 9.4.21.v20190926, 9.4.22.v20191022, and9.4.23.v20191118, the generation of default unhandled Error responsecontent (in text/html and text/json Content-Type) does not escape Exceptionmessages in stacktraces included in error output.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
